amendment.description: To prevent labor disputes at seaports in the United States from causing national economic disruptions and crippling businesses across the United States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 445 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 445 proposed by Senator Gardner. (consideration: CR S1971; text: CR S1971) To prevent labor disputes at seaports in the United States from causing national economic disruptions and crippling businesses across the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 445 proposed by Senator Gardner.
